node1.NPC_Response: Welcome to Acme Tech. My name is Mike and I'm the manager of this office. I'd like to officially welcome our newest addition to the team, Annie.

A.NPC_Response: Here at Acme Tech, we believe in work-life balance and holistic synergy. Take some time to look around and settle in. I'll be available in my office if you have any questions.

AA.PC_Text: Yay! I'm looking forward to working here.
AA.NPC_Response: Once again, welcome to Acme Tech!
